Trade/Device Name(s): Sensititr® Haohilus influenza/Streptococcus euoniae (HP) MIC susceptibility plates
Sensititre® Haemophilus influenzae/Streptococus pneuoniae (HP) MC Susceptibility Plates
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Sensititre Haemophilus influenzae/Streptococcus pneumoniae (HP) MIC susceptibility plates for Meropenem, Moxifloxacin, and Penicillin.
Indications for Use Summary: For clinical susceptibility testing of Haemophilus influenzae, Streptococcus pneumoniae, and Streptococcus species for Meropenem, Moxifloxacin, and Penicillin using the Sensititre HP MIC plates.
